events.message: I just received my new blender, but unfortunately it has multiple scratches and one of the buttons is not working at all.
The reported problem has been categorized as a product defect due to scratches and faulty button functionality.
A customer service agent has now been assigned to handle the defective blender issue and will respond shortly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your blender. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the button that isn’t working? This will help us evaluate the problem accurately.
Here are the pictures showing the scratches on the blender surface and the faulty button that does not respond when pressed.
Thank you for sending the photos. We can offer you a free replacement or a full refund for the defective blender. Please let us know your preference.
I would appreciate a replacement unit, please. Thanks for the quick response and assistance.
We have arranged for a replacement blender to be shipped to your address promptly. You will receive the tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your replacement blender and that it is working well without defects.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is perfect. Thank you for the excellent support!
We are glad the issue was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now and feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
